mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Petry.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sends the following: 1. Copy of works of Destutt-Tracy who has been introduced by Lafayette; 2. treatise on yellow fever by Valentin; 3. report by Marbois, Minister of Finance for year 11 [French year] ; regrets not having sent them before.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Destutt de Tracy, Antoine Louis Claude, comte, 1754-1836
Lafayette, Marie Joseph Paul Yves Roch Gilbert Du Motier, marquis de, 1757-1834
Valentin, Louis, 1758-1829
Barbé-Marbois, François, marquis de, 1745-1837
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1805 July 10, Baltimore, [Maryland] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
